00031 template<class TYPE > class Type;

00033 namespace _internal
00034 {
00035 template<typename T, bool isNumber> class type_compare
00036 {
00037 public:
00038     bool operator()( const Type<T> &first, const TypeBase &second )const {
00039         LOG( Debug, error ) << "comparison of " << Type<T>::staticName() << " is not supportet";
00040         return false;
00041     }
00042 };
00043 template<typename T> class type_compare<T, true>
00044 {
00045 protected:
00046     virtual bool posOverflow( const Type<T> &first, const Type<T> &second )const {return false;} //default to false
00047     virtual bool negOverflow( const Type<T> &first, const Type<T> &second )const {return false;} //default to false
00048     virtual bool inRange( const Type<T> &first, const Type<T> &second )const {return false;} //default to false
00049 public:
00050     bool operator()( const Type<T> &first, const TypeBase &second )const {
00051         // ask second for a converter from itself to Type<T>
00052         const TypeBase::Converter conv = second.getConverterTo( Type<T>::staticID );
00053 
00054         if ( conv ) {
00055             //try to convert second into T and handle results
00056             Type<T> buff;
00057 
00058             switch ( conv->convert( second, buff ) ) {
00059             case boost::numeric::cPosOverflow:
00060                 LOG( Debug, info ) << "Positive overflow when converting " << second.toString( true ) << " to " << Type<T>::staticName() << ".";
00061                 return posOverflow( first, buff );
00062             case boost::numeric::cNegOverflow:
00063                 LOG( Debug, info ) << "Negative overflow when converting " << second.toString( true ) << " to " << Type<T>::staticName() << ".";
00064                 return negOverflow( first, buff );
00065             case boost::numeric::cInRange:
00066                 return inRange( first, buff );
00067             }
00068         } else {
00069             LOG( Debug, error ) << "No conversion of " << second.typeName() << " to " << Type<T>::staticName() << " available";
00070             return false;
00071         }
00072 
00073         return false;
00074     }
00075     virtual ~type_compare() {}
00076 };
00077 
00078 template<typename T, bool isNumber> class type_less : public type_compare<T, isNumber> {};// we are going to specialize this for numeric T below
00079 template<typename T, bool isNumber> class type_greater : public type_compare<T, isNumber> {};
00080 template<typename T, bool isNumber> class type_eq : public type_compare<T, isNumber>
00081 {
00082 protected:
00083     bool inRange( const Type<T> &first, const Type<T> &second )const {
00084         return ( T )first == ( T )second;
00085     }
00086 };
00087 
00088 template<typename T> class type_less<T, true> : public type_compare<T, true>
00089 {
00090 protected:
00091     bool posOverflow( const Type<T> &first, const Type<T> &second )const {
00092         return true; //getting an positive overflow when trying to convert second into T, obviously means first is less
00093     }
00094     bool inRange( const Type<T> &first, const Type<T> &second )const {
00095         return ( T )first < ( T )second;
00096     }
00097 };
00098 template<typename T> class type_greater<T, true> : public type_compare<T, true>
00099 {
00100 protected:
00101     bool negOverflow( const Type<T> &first, const Type<T> &second )const {
00102         return true; //getting an negative overflow when trying to convert second into T, obviously means first is greater
00103     }
00104     bool inRange( const Type<T> &first, const Type<T> &second )const {
00105         return ( T )first > ( T )second;
00106     }
00107 };
00108 
00109 }

00112 template<typename TYPE> class Type: public _internal::TypeBase
00113 {
00114     TYPE m_val;
00115     static const char m_typeName[];
00116 protected:
00117     TypeBase *clone() const {
00118         return new Type<TYPE>( *this );
00119     }
00120 public:
00121     static const unsigned short staticID = _internal::TypeId<TYPE>::value;
00122     Type() {
00123         BOOST_MPL_ASSERT_RELATION( staticID, < , 0xFF );
00124         check_type<TYPE>();
00125     }
00131     template<typename T> Type( const T &value ) {
00132         m_val = _internal::__cast_to<TYPE>()( this, value );
00133         BOOST_MPL_ASSERT_RELATION( staticID, < , 0xFF );
00134         check_type<TYPE>();
00135     }
00136     std::string toString( bool labeled = false )const {
00137         std::string ret;
00138         Reference ref = copyToNewById( Type<std::string>::staticID );
00139 
00140         if ( ref.empty() ) {
00141             LOG( Debug, error ) << "Automatic conversion of " << *this << " to string failed. Falling back to boost::lexical_cast<std::string>";
00142             ret = boost::lexical_cast<std::string>( m_val );
00143         } else {
00144             ret = ref->cast_to<std::string>();
00145         }
00146 
00147         if ( labeled )ret += "(" + staticName() + ")";
00148 
00149         return ret;
00150     }
00151     virtual std::string typeName()const {
00152         return staticName();
00153     }
00154     virtual unsigned short typeID()const {
00155         return staticID;
00156     }
00157 
00159     virtual bool operator==( const TypeBase &second )const {
00160         if ( second.is<TYPE>() ) {
00161             return m_val == second.cast_to<TYPE>();
00162         } else
00163             return  false;
00164     }
00165 
00167     static std::string staticName() {return m_typeName;}
00168 
00180     operator const TYPE&()const {return m_val;}
00181     operator TYPE&() {return m_val;}
00182 
00183     bool gt( const _internal::TypeBase &ref )const {
00184         return _internal::type_greater<TYPE, boost::is_arithmetic<TYPE>::value >()( *this, ref );
00185     }
00186     bool lt( const _internal::TypeBase &ref )const {
00187         return _internal::type_less<TYPE, boost::is_arithmetic<TYPE>::value >()( *this, ref );
00188     }
00189     bool eq( const _internal::TypeBase &ref )const {
00190         return _internal::type_eq<TYPE, boost::is_arithmetic<TYPE>::value >()( *this, ref );
00191     }
00192 
00193     virtual ~Type() {}
00194 };

00196 template<typename T> const Type<T>& _internal::TypeBase::cast_to_Type() const
00197 {
00198     check_type<T>();
00199     return m_cast_to<Type<T> >();
00200 }
00201 template<typename T> const T &_internal::TypeBase::cast_to() const
00202 {
00203     const Type<T> &ret = cast_to_Type<T>();
00204     return ret.operator const T & ();
00205 }
00206 template<typename T> Type<T>& _internal::TypeBase::cast_to_Type()
00207 {
00208     check_type<T>();
00209     return m_cast_to<Type<T> >();
00210 }
00211 template<typename T> T &_internal::TypeBase::cast_to()
00212 {
00213     Type<T> &ret = cast_to_Type<T>();
00214     return ret.operator T & ();
00215 }
00216 
00217 template<typename T> bool _internal::TypeBase::is()const
00218 {
00219     check_type<T>();
00220     return typeID() == Type<T>::staticID;
00221 }
